TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataControlExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataControlExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET 动态数据所使用的扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于启用 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件中的动态数据功能。The class is used to enable Dynamic Data features in ASP.NET data-bound controls. ## Examples 有关如何启用数据绑定控件中的动态数据功能的示例，请参阅[演练： 在 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件中启用动态数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f)。For an example of how to enable Dynamic Data features in a data-bound control, see [Walkthrough: Enabling Dynamic Data in ASP.NET Data-Bound Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f).

summary.span: 为指定数据控件启用动态数据行为。

span.span: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnableDynamicData (this System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, Type entityType);
